resources.string: Explore Your Favourite Websites by Picking the Popular Websites or Search on Specific Website by Url or Google Search
Link Loom Support Profiles and Pin Code for each profile and Each User can Pick His Profile with a Browsing History for each Account
Link Loom Support Link Sharing From your Android Mobile Device to Your TV Directly, No Need to Write the Url Manually (This Feature Support Google Chromecast and Bluetooth Connection)
